name: Aspect of Avoidance
description: Whenever an enemy hits you, your Dodge Chance against that enemy increases by [6.0 - 10.0]%%[+]. Successfully Dodging resets this bonus.

name: Aspect of Reactive Armor
description: Gain 10%%[+] Block Chance. Blocking an attack from an enemy has a [30 - 70]%% chance to cast a free Concussive Stomp at them.

name: Aspect of Momentum

name: Aspect of Endurance

name: Aspect of Alacrity
